## comments.WorkspaceComment.(constructor)

Constructs the comment.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(workspace: Workspace, id?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace to construct the comment in. |
|  id | string | _(Optional)_ An optional ID to give to the comment. If not provided, one will be generated. |
